channel.title: How to edit where new players login
channel.description:
in deltascape its in one specific place in falador garden, not random around it.
but im not sure where to find it.. please help?
idk either its 317 or anything, but yea.. if you played delta you'd know..
please help? :)

item.title: How to edit where new players login
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

sorry xray i havent done that in a long time and really didn’t feel like looking… don’t be such a dick dude this is a help not put down area if it didnt help him then he can post then i would look into it…

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit where new players login

item.title: How to edit where new players login
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

Jordiescape:

Most likely the class Player.

Correct.

[quote=“kingofnone, post:3, topic:256547”]what i normally do is stand in the spot were they spawn and go to my client or playerhandler… may be in server doubt it but just type one of the cords
like if your standing at
1111 2222
xxxx yyyy

type in control f 1111 and see what it says?

and change it to whatever coord you want[/quote]
Why would coords of player spawns, be in a client folder?Its in player.java(the player class) in your server files, don’t post unless you know what your talking about.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit where new players login
